try{const favorites=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("userFavorites")||"[]");if(!favorites.includes(recipeId)){favorites.push(recipeId);localStorage.setItem("userFavorites",JSON.stringify(favorites));}return{success:true,data:{message:"Added to favorites"}};}catch(localError){console.error("Error saving to localStorage:",localError);return{success:false,error:"Failed to add to favorites"};}}}// Remove recipe from favorites
